description.title: What is SVG Placeholder Generator?
description.text: SVG Placeholder Generator is a free, developer-friendly tool designed to create lightweight placeholder images for your web projects. Unlike traditional image placeholders that require external HTTP requests, our tool generates pure SVG code that you can embed directly into your HTML or CSS. This ensures faster page loads and better performance. You can fully customize the dimensions, colors, and text to match your design requirements.

howTo.title: How to Use SVG Placeholder Generator
steps: Enter the desired width and height for your placeholder image
Choose a background color and text color using the color pickers
Optionally, enter custom text to display (defaults to dimensions)
Adjust the font size if needed
Click 'Copy SVG Code' to use it immediately or 'Download SVG' to save the file

questions.a: SVGs are vector-based, meaning they are extremely lightweight and scale infinitely without pixelation. They are perfect for responsive designs and don't add unnecessary weight to your page load.

questions.q: Can I use these placeholders in production?
questions.a: Absolutely! The generated SVGs are standard code that works in all modern browsers. You can use them as 'src' in image tags or as background images in CSS.

questions.q: Do I need to attribute this tool?
questions.a: No attribution is required. You are free to use the generated placeholders in any project, personal or commercial.

questions.q: Is there a limit to the image size?
questions.a: Technically no, but for very large dimensions, you might want to ensure the font size is adjusted accordingly to remain visible.
